00017 PortMapsView::PortMapsView(QSortFilterProxyModel* proxy, QWidget *parent): 
00018 QTableView(parent), 
00019 proxy_(proxy),
00020 removeAction_(tr("Remove mapping"), this),
00021 restoreAction_(tr("Restore port to list"), this),
00022 menuTarget_(),
00023 startPos_() {
00024 
00025         // connect the action triggers to handlers
00026         connect(&removeAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00027                 this, SLOT(onRemoveItem()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00028         connect(&restoreAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00029                 this, SLOT(onRestoreItem()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00030 
00031         // items can be dragged but not dropped
00032         setDragDropMode(QAbstractItemView::DragOnly);
00033 
00034         setSortingEnabled(true);
00035 
00036         horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00037         horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Interactive);
00038         horizontalHeader()->setMinimumSectionSize(50);
00039 
00040         setItemDelegate(new PortMapsDelegate(this));
00041 
00042         setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00043 
00044         setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00045         setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectItems);
00046         verticalHeader()->hide();
00047         setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::DoubleClicked | 
00048                 QAbstractItemView::SelectedClicked | QAbstractItemView::EditKeyPressed);
00049         setWordWrap(true);
00050 
00051         // the view accepts drop events
00052         setAcceptDrops(true);
00053 }

00058 void PortMapsView::keyPressEvent( QKeyEvent* event ) {
00059 
00060         // if delete was pressed
00061         if (event->key() == Qt::Key_Delete) {
00062                 emit removeItems(proxy_->mapToSource(currentIndex()));
00063         }
00064 
00065         // call the default implementation
00066         QTableView::keyPressEvent(event);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void PortMapsView::contextMenuEvent( QContextMenuEvent* event ) {
00070 
00071         QMenu contextMenu(this);
00072         contextMenu.addAction(&removeAction_);
00073 
00074         menuTarget_ = indexAt(event->pos());
00075         
00076         // if the model index is invalid
00077         if (!menuTarget_.isValid())
00078                 return;
00079 
00080         // if a port is selected
00081         if (menuTarget_.column() == 2 || menuTarget_.column() == 3) {
00082                 contextMenu.addAction(&restoreAction_);
00083         }
00084         
00085         contextMenu.exec(event->globalPos());
00086         event->accept();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void PortMapsView::onRemoveItem() {
00090 
00091         if (menuTarget_.isValid())
00092                 emit removeItems(menuTarget_);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void PortMapsView::onRestoreItem() {
00096 
00097         if (!menuTarget_.isValid())
00098                 return;
00099 
00100         if (menuTarget_.column() == 2 || menuTarget_.column() == 3)
00101                 emit restoreItem(menuTarget_);
00102 }

00105 void PortMapsView::dragEnterEvent( QDragEnterEvent* event ) {
00106         // make sure the source is not this model and that data is correct type
00107         PortListView* source = qobject_cast<PortListView*>(event->source());
00108         if (source && event->mimeData()->hasFormat("text/plain")) {
00109 
00110                 // the item can be removed from the original model
00111                 event->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00112                 event->accept();
00113         }

00116 /*
00117 void PortMapsView::dropEvent( QDropEvent* event ) {
00118         // make sure the source is not this view
00119         PortListView* source = qobject_cast<PortListView*>(event->source());
00120         if (!source) {
00121                 return;
00122         }
00123 
00124         QModelIndex index = indexAt(event->pos());
00125 
00126         // if no port name has been specified or drop index is invalid
00127         QString mimeText = event->mimeData()->text();
00128         if (mimeText.isEmpty() || !index.isValid()) {
00129 
00130                 // tell source that nothing is to be done to item
00131                 event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
00132                 event->accept();
00133                 return;
00134         }
00135 
00136         // get the ports that were selected
00137         QStringList portNames = mimeText.split(QString(";"), QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00138 
00139         // if the item to drop is from this port list view
00140         if (source == this) {
00141                 emit moveItems(portNames, index);
00142                 event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
00143                 event->accept();
00144                 return;
00145         }
00146 
00147         // if the item to drop is from another port list view
00148         else {
00149                 foreach (QString portName, portNames) {
00150 
00151                         // make connection for each port
00152                         if (!portName.isEmpty())
00153                                 emit portDropped(portName, index);
00154                 }
00155                 // tell model that this index can also be removed
00156                 emit removeItem(index);
00157 
00158                 // accept the drop as move action so item can be removed from original model
00159                 event->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00160                 event->accept();
00161         }
00162 }
00163 */
00164 
00165 void PortMapsView::dragMoveEvent( QDragMoveEvent* e ) {
00166         // make sure the source is not this model and that data is correct type
00167         PortMapsView* source = qobject_cast<PortMapsView*>(e->source());
00168 
00169         if (source && source != this) {
00170 
00171                 // the item can be removed from the original model
00172                 e->setDropAction(Qt::CopyAction);
00173                 e->accept();
00174         }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void PortMapsView::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00178         // if left mouse button is pressed
00179         if (event->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton) {
00180 
00181                 // calculate how much mouse was moved
00182                 int distance = (event->pos() - startPos_).manhattanLength();
00183 
00184                 // if the move distance is enough to start the drag
00185                 if (distance >= QApplication::startDragDistance())
00186                         performDrag();
00187         }
00188 }
00189 
00190 void PortMapsView::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00191         if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00192                 startPos_ = event->pos();
00193         QTableView::mousePressEvent(event);
00194 }
00195 
00196 void PortMapsView::performDrag() {
00197         QModelIndex index = currentIndex();
00198         if (!index.isValid())
00199                 return;
00200 
00201         // set the mime data
00202         QMimeData* mimeData = new QMimeData();
00203         mimeData->setText(index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString());
00204 
00205         QDrag* drag = new QDrag(this);
00206         drag->setMimeData(mimeData);
00207         if (drag->exec(Qt::CopyAction) == Qt::CopyAction) {
00208                 emit restoreItem(index);
00209         }
00210 }
